sentences.sContent: a chart showing last year’s sales
sentences.sCn: 显示去年销售情况的一份图表

sentences.sContent: ...yet the chart of Weekly earnings in 2010 reveals a forceful counter-evidence that the income is in direct proportion to one's educational background...

words.tran: 图籍未载的；尚未绘入地图或海图的
宪章派；图解专家；宪章运动者

trans.tranOther: information that is clearly arranged in the form of a simple picture, set of figures,  graph  etc, or a piece of paper with this information on it
